Adaptive.name: Adaptive
Adaptive.description: Once per battle, after being attacked, changes the Temtem's second type to the type of the received technique and gets SPATK.

Aerobic.name: Aerobic
Aerobic.description: After attacking with a Wind technique, gets SPDEF and SPD.

Aggressor.name: Aggressor
Aggressor.description: When entering the battlefield, gets ATK and DEF.

Air Specialist.name: Air Specialist
Air Specialist.description: Damage done with Wind techniques is increased by 15%.

Amphibian.name: Amphibian
Amphibian.description: After being attacked with a Water technique, gets SPD and ATK.

Anaerobic.name: Anaerobic
Anaerobic.description: After attacking with a Toxic technique, gets SPDEF and SPATK.

Antibodies.name: Antibodies
Antibodies.description: When attacked with an Toxic technique, gets DEF and SPDEF.

Apothecary.name: Apothecary
Apothecary.description: After attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 1 turn if it's a rival or regenerating for 1 turn if it's an ally or itself.

Arcane Wrap.name: Arcane Wrap
Arcane Wrap.description: Damage taken from special techniques is reduced by 20%.

Attack<T>.name: Attack<T>
Attack<T>.description: Changes the Temtem's second type to the type of the technique it's about to use.

Autotomy.name: Autotomy
Autotomy.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, gets evading for 2 turns.

Avenger.name: Avenger
Avenger.description: When an ally is knocked-out, gets SPATK and SPD.

Benefactor.name: Benefactor
Benefactor.description: When an ally is damaged by a technique, restores 8% of max HP.

Body Stretch.name: Body Stretch
Body Stretch.description: When resting, restores 10% of max HP and gets regenerating for 1 turn.

Book Lungs.name: Book Lungs
Book Lungs.description: Damage taken from Water techniques is reduced by 50%.

Botanist.name: Botanist
Botanist.description: Damage done with Nature techniques is increased by 15%.

Botanophobia.name: Botanophobia
Botanophobia.description: Damage taken from Nature techniques is increased by 50%.

Brawny.name: Brawny
Brawny.description: Damage done with physical techniques is increased by 15%.

Bruiser.name: Bruiser
Bruiser.description: Damage done with Melee techniques is increased by 15%.

Brumation.name: Brumation
Brumation.description: When resting, gets DEF and -1 hold.

Bully.name: Bully
Bully.description: While allies outnumber rivals, techniques inflict +30% Damage.

Burglar.name: Burglar
Burglar.description: When attacking an asleep or exhausted Temtem, disables its gear.

Callosity.name: Callosity
Callosity.description: After being attacked with a physical technique, gets DEF.

Camaraderie.name: Camaraderie
Camaraderie.description: When attacked, reduces damage taken by 50% if both allies are part of the same evolutionary line.

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: When attacked with a physical technique, gets evading for 2 turns.

Channeler.name: Channeler
Channeler.description: Damage done with special techniques is increased by 25%.

Cobweb.name: Cobweb
Cobweb.description: When poisoning or attacking a poisoned Temtem, the target also gets trapped for 2 turns.

Cold-Blooded.name: Cold-Blooded
Cold-Blooded.description: Instead of getting cold or frozen, the Temtem regenerates for 1 turn.

Cold-Natured.name: Cold-Natured
Cold-Natured.description: Instead of getting cold, the Temtem gets frozen.

Comebacker.name: Comebacker
Comebacker.description: When damaged by a technique, damage done to the attacker is increased by 32% during the same turn.

Common Factor.name: Common Factor
Common Factor.description: When entering the battlefield, all Temtem get nullified for 2 turns.

Confident.name: Confident
Confident.description: When using an effective or super effective technique, gets SPD.

Confined.name: Confined
Confined.description: When getting an trapped status condition, gets DEF and SPDEF if the attacker is itself.

Contagious.name: Contagious
Contagious.description: When a rival exits the battlefield, they get poisoned for 1 turn.

Contemplation.name: Contemplation
Contemplation.description: Once per battle, when resting, gets ATK and SPD.

Coward's Rest.name: Coward's Rest
Coward's Rest.description: When resting, gets evading and invigorated for 2 turns.

Deceit Aura.name: Deceit Aura
Deceit Aura.description: Techniques order is inverted during the first 4 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield. And while HP is full, when entering the battlefield, loses 50%.

Defuser.name: Defuser
Defuser.description: When attacking with a physical technique, the target gets seized for 3 turns.

Demoralize.name: Demoralize
Demoralize.description: When entering the battlefield, rivals get SPD.

Digi-Protection.name: Digi-Protection
Digi-Protection.description: Damage taken from Digital techniques is reduced by 75%.

Disgrace.name: Disgrace
Disgrace.description: When a rival exits the battlefield, they get DEF and SPDEF.

Dozing Hit.name: Dozing Hit
Dozing Hit.description: After using an effective or super-effective technique, the target gets asleep for 1 turn.

Dreaded Alarm.name: Dreaded Alarm
Dreaded Alarm.description: When a rival rests, they lose 25% of max HP.

Earthbound.name: Earthbound
Earthbound.description: After attacking with a Earth technique, gets DEF.

Effective Denial.name: Effective Denial
Effective Denial.description: Damage taken from effective techniques is reduced by 30%.

Efficient.name: Efficient
Efficient.description: When attacking, STA cost is reduced by 30%.

Electric Custodian.name: Electric Custodian
Electric Custodian.description: Electric techniques targeting the ally will target the Temtem instead and deal 15% less damage.

Electric Synthesize.name: Electric Synthesize
Electric Synthesize.description: When attacked with an Electric technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

Energized.name: Energized
Energized.description: At the start of the turn, restores 6% of max HP.

Energy Reserves.name: Energy Reserves
Energy Reserves.description: Once per battle, if the Temtem is attacked and HP is below 40%, gets ATK and invigorated for 2 turns.

Enraged.name: Enraged
Enraged.description: While HP is below 30%, damage done is increased by 30%.

Escapist.name: Escapist
Escapist.description: When entering the battlefield, removes the trapped status condition on the ally and prevents the trapped status condition on the ally and itself.

Fainted Curse.name: Fainted Curse
Fainted Curse.description: When knocked-out, the attacker loses 30% of max HP.

Fast Charge.name: Fast Charge
Fast Charge.description: Once per battle, when a Digital ally enters the battlefield, gets SPD.

Fever Rush.name: Fever Rush
Fever Rush.description: When getting a status condition, gets ATK.

Final Stand.name: Final Stand
Final Stand.description: At the start of the turn, while HP is below 30%, gets DEF and SPDEF.

Flawed Crystal.name: Flawed Crystal
Flawed Crystal.description: Damage taken from Mental, Toxic, or Electric techniques is increased by 50%.

Frightening.name: Frightening
Frightening.description: Gears from the rival and the ally don't have any effect during the first 5 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

Furor.name: Furor
Furor.description: When HP is below 33%, techniques do 33% more damage.

Going Away Gift.name: Going Away Gift
Going Away Gift.description: When knocked-out, adds the Temtem positive stat stage changes to the ally.

Good Friend.name: Good Friend
Good Friend.description: After the ally receives a rival attack, the next one during the same turn gets redirected to the Temtem.

Gotta Go Fast.name: Gotta Go Fast
Gotta Go Fast.description: Changes the Temtem's very low, low and normal priority techniques to high priority.

Guardian.name: Guardian
Guardian.description: Prevents negative stat stage changes and the cold, Frozen, burned, poisoned, and doomed status conditions on the ally.

Haka.name: Haka
Haka.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, the ally gets ATK and SPATK.

Half Full.name: Half Full
Half Full.description: Once per battle and while HP is full, when entering the battlefield, loses 50% of max HP and gets ATK, DEF, SPATK, and SPDEF.

Heat Discharge.name: Heat Discharge
Heat Discharge.description: When knocked-out, the attacker gets burned for 3 turns.

Heater.name: Heater
Heater.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, all other Temtem get burned for 1 turn.

Hostile.name: Hostile
Hostile.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, gets ATK and SPATK.

Hover.name: Hover
Hover.description: Damage taken from Earth techniques is reduced by 50%.

Hurry-wart.name: Hurry-wart
Hurry-wart.description: When entering the battlefield, the Temtem gets -1 Hold.

Hydrologist.name: Hydrologist
Hydrologist.description: Damage done with Water techniques is increased by 15%.

Hypnotist.name: Hypnotist
Hypnotist.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, rivals and the ally get asleep for 1 turn.

Ignis Fatuus.name: Ignis Fatuus
Ignis Fatuus.description: When another Temtem is knocked-out, gets evading for 1 turn.

Immunity.name: Immunity
Immunity.description: Resists damage from Toxic techniques and prevents poisoned.

Individualist.name: Individualist
Individualist.description: Techniques targeting the ally will fail.

Inductor.name: Inductor
Inductor.description: After attacking with a Electric technique, restores 8% of max HP.

Infectious.name: Infectious
Infectious.description: Invalidates the regenerating effect on rivals.

Inhibiter.name: Inhibiter
Inhibiter.description: Once per battle, when attacking a Temtem, disables its trait.

Intimidator.name: Intimidator
Intimidator.description: Traits from the rivals and the ally don't have any effect during the first 5 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

Iridescence.name: Iridescence
Iridescence.description: Type resistances for the Temtem are reversed.

Kinetic Transfer.name: Kinetic Transfer
Kinetic Transfer.description: When attacked, restores 10% of max STA and the attacker loses 10% of max STA.

Landing Transmog.name: Landing Transmog
Landing Transmog.description: When entering the battlefield, Mimit transforms into the next Temtem in clockwise order.

Last Rush.name: Last Rush
Last Rush.description: While rivals outnumber allies, techniques inflict +40% Damage.

Loneliness.name: Loneliness
Loneliness.description: Synergies won't work on both allies.

Marathonist.name: Marathonist
Marathonist.description: When attacking, gets SPD, and STA cost is reduced by 50%.

Meditation.name: Meditation
Meditation.description: When resting, heals all negative status conditions, and gets regenerating for 1 turn.

Mental Alliance.name: Mental Alliance
Mental Alliance.description: Increases SPATK by 15% if ally is Mental.

Mineral Crusher.name: Mineral Crusher
Mineral Crusher.description: Damage done to Earth or Crystal Temtem is increased by 25%.

Mirroring.name: Mirroring
Mirroring.description: When attacked with a Special technique, the attacker gets 25% knockback damage.

Mithridatism.name: Mithridatism
Mithridatism.description: Prevents the poisoned status condition and reduces damage taken from Toxic Techniques by 20%.

Motivator.name: Motivator
Motivator.description: At the start of the turn, allies restore 10% of max STA.

Mucous.name: Mucous
Mucous.description: Damage taken from Electric or Toxic techniques is reduced by 30% and prevents the cold and burned status condition.

Neurotoxins.name: Neurotoxins
Neurotoxins.description: Instead of applying poison, the target gets doomed for 4 turns instead.

Parrier.name: Parrier
Parrier.description: Damage taken from physical techniques is reduced by 20%.

Patient.name: Patient
Patient.description: Restores 15% of max STA when using a Hold technique.

Physgulp.name: Physgulp
Physgulp.description: When attacked with a physical technique, restores 8% of max HP.

Physmaster.name: Physmaster
Physmaster.description: Damage done with physical techniques is increased by 50%.

Pigment Inverter.name: Pigment Inverter
Pigment Inverter.description: When attacking, type resistances for the target Temtem are reversed.

Plethoric.name: Plethoric
Plethoric.description: Increases SPD by 30% while HP is over 70%.

Power Nap.name: Power Nap
Power Nap.description: At the start of the turn, restores 15% of max HP of an Asleep Temtem.

Predatory.name: Predatory
Predatory.description: Restores HP by 30% upon knocking out a Temtem.

Prideful.name: Prideful
Prideful.description: When attacking, gets ATK, SPATK and SPD if the target gets knocked-out.

Protective Crystal.name: Protective Crystal
Protective Crystal.description: When an ally is damaged by an Electric, Mental, or Fire technique, damage is reduced by 20%.

Protector.name: Protector
Protector.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, the ally gets DEF and SPDEF.

Provident.name: Provident
Provident.description: After being attacked with a Fire, Earth or Melee technique, gets SPDEF.

Punch Bag.name: Punch Bag
Punch Bag.description: Damage taken from Melee techniques is reduced by 30%.

Puppet Master.name: Puppet Master
Puppet Master.description: While HP is below 40%, received rival techniques get redirected to the ally.

Pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac.description: Damage done with Fire techniques is increased by 15%.

Receptive.name: Receptive
Receptive.description: When getting a favorable status condition, increases its turns by 1.

Refurbished.name: Refurbished
Refurbished.description: Once per battle, regenerating for 4 turns after 3 consecutive turns on the battlefield.

Rejuvenate.name: Rejuvenate
Rejuvenate.description: After attacking with a special technique, restores 8% of max HP.

Relaxed.name: Relaxed
Relaxed.description: Restores 15% of max HP after not receiving any rival attacks during the turn.

Resilient.name: Resilient
Resilient.description: Once per battle, when knocked-out due to overexertion, prevents getting knocked-out, removes the overexertion turn penalization and gets SPD.

Resistant.name: Resistant
Resistant.description: When getting a negative status condition, decreases its turns by 1.

Rested.name: Rested
Rested.description: Increases ATK and SPATK by 30% during the first 2 turns the Temtem is on the battlefield.

Royal Jelly.name: Royal Jelly
Royal Jelly.description: At the start of the turn, allies restore 5% of max HP.

Ruminant.name: Ruminant
Ruminant.description: When attacking a Nature Temtem rival, gets regenerating for 2 turns.

Rusher.name: Rusher
Rusher.description: When the Temtem exits the battlefield, gets SPD, and when a rival enters the battlefield, gets SPD.

Scavenger.name: Scavenger
Scavenger.description: Restores 17% of max HP if another Temtem is knocked-out.

Seismic.name: Seismic
Seismic.description: When entering the battlefield, rivals lose 7% of their max HP. This effect cannot knock out Temtem.

Self-Care.name: Self-Care
Self-Care.description: When attacked with a physical or special technique, gets regenerating for 1 turn.

Self-Esteem.name: Self-Esteem
Self-Esteem.description: When attacking, removes all negative status conditions if the target gets knocked-out.

Sensei.name: Sensei
Sensei.description: When attacking with a Physical technique, uses SPATK, and when attacking with a Special technique, uses the ATK.

Sentinel.name: Sentinel
Sentinel.description: When entering the battlefield, removes the asleep status condition on the ally and prevents the asleep status condition on the ally and itself.

Seppuku.name: Seppuku
Seppuku.description: When attacking and being knocked-out due to overexertion, the target gets doomed for 2 turns.

Settling.name: Settling
Settling.description: Increases ATK by 8% for each turn the Temtem stays on the battlefield.

Shaolin.name: Shaolin
Shaolin.description: Damage done with special techniques is increased by 10%.

Shared Pain.name: Shared Pain
Shared Pain.description: After receiving a rival attack, the next one during the same turn gets redirected to the ally.

Short Circuit.name: Short Circuit
Short Circuit.description: Prevents all stat changes on all Temtem.

Skull Helmet.name: Skull Helmet
Skull Helmet.description: Damage taken from Mental or Melee techniques is reduced by 25%.

Snowstorm.name: Snowstorm
Snowstorm.description: Once per battle, when entering the battlefield, rivals and the ally get cold for 3 turns if they aren't cold already.

Soft Touch.name: Soft Touch
Soft Touch.description: When attacking an asleep target, damage done is increased by 20% and the target won't wake up.

Solidifier.name: Solidifier
Solidifier.description: When attacking with a Water Special technique, uses the ATK.

Source Replicator.name: Source Replicator
Source Replicator.description: When getting a positive status condition, adds the change to the ally too.

Specgulp.name: Specgulp
Specgulp.description: When attacked with a special technique, restores 8% of max HP.

Specmaster.name: Specmaster
Specmaster.description: Damage done with special techniques is increased by 50%

Spiritual.name: Spiritual
Spiritual.description: When entering the battlefield, gets SPATK and SPDEF.

Splitter.name: Splitter
Splitter.description: When attacked with a physical or special technique, prevents all negative status conditions.

Spoilsport.name: Spoilsport
Spoilsport.description: Damage done with multi-target techniques is increased by 25%.

Spreader.name: Spreader
Spreader.description: If there are multiple rivals, single-target special techniques become multi-target and damage done with them is reduced by 20%.

Stabmaster.name: Stabmaster
Stabmaster.description: Damage done with matching type techniques is increased by 40%.

Striking Transmog.name: Striking Transmog
Striking Transmog.description: When attacking an individual Temtem with a physical technique, Mimit transforms into the target.

Strong Liver.name: Strong Liver
Strong Liver.description: When attacked with a Toxic technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

Superconductivity.name: Superconductivity
Superconductivity.description: When an ally uses a technique, the temtem counts as all types for its synergy.

Synergy Adept.name: Synergy Adept
Synergy Adept.description: Damage done with synergy techniques is increased by 15% while the Temtem participate in the synergy.

Synergy Master.name: Synergy Master
Synergy Master.description: Damage done with synergy techniques is increased by 25% while the Temtem participate in the synergy.

Synertyper.name: Synertyper
Synertyper.description: Damage done with techniques is increased by 30% if both allies share a type.

Tactical Strike.name: Tactical Strike
Tactical Strike.description: Damage done with Hold techniques is increased by 20%.

Tag Team.name: Tag Team
Tag Team.description: Damage taken from techniques is reduced by 15% if both allies share a type.

Tardy Rush.name: Tardy Rush
Tardy Rush.description: Increases SPD by 85% and ATK by 10% after 3 consecutive turns on the battlefield.

Target Replicator.name: Target Replicator
Target Replicator.description: When the ally gets a positive status condition, adds the change to the Temtem too.

Thick Skin.name: Thick Skin
Thick Skin.description: Damage taken by Wind techniques is reduced by 50%.

Tireless.name: Tireless
Tireless.description: When overexerted, prevents the turn penalization and gets ATK.

Toxic Affinity.name: Toxic Affinity
Toxic Affinity.description: Toxic techniques get type damage boost.

Toxic Farewell.name: Toxic Farewell
Toxic Farewell.description: When knocked-out, the attacker loses 10% of max HP and gets poisoned for 3 turns.

Toxic Skin.name: Toxic Skin
Toxic Skin.description: After being attacked with a physical technique, the attacker gets poisoned for 2 turns.

Toxin Crusher.name: Toxin Crusher
Toxin Crusher.description: Damage done to Toxic Temtem is increased by 50%.

Trance.name: Trance
Trance.description: Once per battle, if the Temtem is attacked and HP is below 30%, gets asleep for 2 turns and regenerating for 3 turns, SPATK and SPDEF.

Trauma.name: Trauma
Trauma.description: After being attacked if hit by a Physical technique gets DEF; if hit by a Special technique, SPDEF.

Tri-Apothecary.name: Tri-Apothecary
Tri-Apothecary.description: After attacking with a special technique, the target gets poisoned for 3 turns if it's a rival or regenerating for 3 turns if it's an ally or itself.

Unnoticed.name: Unnoticed
Unnoticed.description: Gets SPD after not receiving any rival attacks during the turn.

Vigorous.name: Vigorous
Vigorous.description: Damage done when overexerting is increased by 50%.

Viral Combustion.name: Viral Combustion
Viral Combustion.description: When getting a poison status condition, the attacker gets burned for 4 turns.

Voltaic Charge.name: Voltaic Charge
Voltaic Charge.description: When attacked with a single-target technique, the attacker gets 10% knockback damage.

Voodoo.name: Voodoo
Voodoo.description: When attacking an ally, 75% of the damage is replicated to each rival.

Warm Gift.name: Warm Gift
Warm Gift.description: When a rival exits the battlefield, they get burned for 3 turns.

Warm-Blooded.name: Warm-Blooded
Warm-Blooded.description: Prevents the Cold and Frozen status condition.

Water Affinity.name: Water Affinity
Water Affinity.description: Water techniques get type damage boost.

Water Custodian.name: Water Custodian
Water Custodian.description: Water techniques targeting the ally will target the Temtem instead and deal 15% less damage.

Water Synthesizer.name: Water Synthesizer
Water Synthesizer.description: When attacked with a Water technique, restores HP instead of receiving damage.

Wax Bath.name: Wax Bath
Wax Bath.description: When an ally rests, they get SPDEF.

Welcomer.name: Welcomer
Welcomer.description: Once per battle, when an ally enters the battlefield, the ally gets evading for 1 turn.

Withdrawal.name: Withdrawal
Withdrawal.description: When resting, restores 20% of max HP and removes asleep and poisoned status conditions.

Wrecked Farewell.name: Wrecked Farewell
Wrecked Farewell.description: When self knocked-out, rivals lose 25% of max HP.

Zen.name: Zen
Zen.description: When getting an asleep status condition, gets DEF and SPDEF.
